question:
Match List I with List II and select the correct answer by using the codes given below the lists:
List I List II
(Functionaries) (Oaths or affirmations)
I. President of India (A) Secrecy of Information
II. Judges of the Supreme Court (B) Faithful Discharge of Duties
III. Members of Parliament (C) Faith and Allegiance to the Constitution of India
IV. Ministers for the Union (D) Upholding the Constitution and the Law
Codes:
explanation:
(Functionaries) (Oaths or affirmations)
I. President of India  Faith and Allegiance to the Constitution of India
II. Judges of the Supreme Court  Upholding the Constitution and the Law
III. Members of Parliament  Faithful Discharge of Duties
IV. Ministers for the Union  Secrecy of Information
Oath or affirmation by the President under article 60
Oath or affirmation by Judge of SC, Members of Parliament, Ministers for the Union comes under Third Schedule of the Constitution.
